name: GADFLY
description:
The first demo for my new project, Gadfly!

In this new take on the vertical shooter genre, take control of a lone alien invader and infect the defense force of a human federation. Do you have what it takes to complete your mission before you run out of time?

Demo currently includes a feature-complete prototype of the first level. I would love feedback on the core mechanics (shooting, capturing enemy ships, launching ships) in order to polish them as I move forward.
